name: RestaurantFinder
0:
”Alexa, start restaurant finder”
”Alexa, run restaurant finder”
”Alexa, launch restaurant finder”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: restaurant finder
des:
This skill leverages Yelp reviews to help you find the most reviewed restaurants serving the food you crave. Alexa will ask you what type of food you want and in what city you are looking in. With your inputs, Alexa will invoke Yelp API to list a few restaurants that are near you within a 2-3 mile radius and are open at the moment.

Icon made by Freepik from www.flaticon.com
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
